title: BC上ProtocolLib插件报错
txt_content:

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
尝试移除ProtocolLib插件
直接安装ColorMotd
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-448326-1-1.html

ProtocolLib是ColorMotd在Bukkit上的必需前置
